resources.string: This application requires accessibility permission to manage your blocked contacts and application. Without permission, app will not work at all.
Permission denied! Application may not work properly
To enable DrunkSoda, please turn on the DrunkSoda service in \"Settings - Accessibility - DrunkSoda\"
Choose what you want to block with this contact
Enable to disable incoming and outgoing calls from this contact
Enable to disable incoming and outgoing messages from this contact
No blocked contacts, press to add
No blocked apps, press to add
Cannot add duplicate contact, you need edit existing
DrinkSoda has been block \"%s:%s\", while service is enabled
DrinkSoda has been block \"%s:%s\", while service is enabled
DrunkSoda has been closed \"%s\" application, while service is enabled!

You can harm yourself however you want. But you can not do this with others.\n\nThis app is made to protect you from yourself. Just add people to whom you do not want to contact. Just add application which you do not want to use.
